## ComponentView interface

Component view wrapper containing rendered output from a TEA component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface ComponentView 
```

## Remarks

Component views are returned by the builder when registering components via [AppBuilder.component()](./dsl.appbuilder.component.md)<!-- -->. They contain the pre-rendered string output from the component's `view()` method.

## Example


```typescript
createApp()
  .component('spinner', spinner())
  .view(({ components }) => components.spinner)
  //                        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ComponentView
```
